name: UpdateGithubIssue
description:
Update details of a GitHub issue.

Use this tool when you need to update the information of an existing GitHub issue. Suitable for issue owners or users with push access.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository, case insensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to update the issue in. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_identifier
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the GitHub issue to update.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: issue_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details to update the issue, including assignees, body, labels, milestone, state, state reason, and title.

assignee.description: Username to assign to this issue. **This field is deprecated.**

assignees.description: Usernames to assign to this issue. Pass one or more user logins to _replace_ the set of assignees on this issue. Send an empty array (`[]`) to clear all assignees from the issue. Only users with push access can set assignees for new issues. Without push access to the repository, assignee changes are silently dropped.

labels.description: Labels to associate with this issue. Pass one or more labels to _replace_ the set of labels on this issue. Send an empty array (`[]`) to clear all labels from the issue. Only users with push access can set labels for issues. Without push access to the repository, label changes are silently dropped.

state.description: The open or closed state of the issue.

state_reason.description: The reason for the state change. Ignored unless `state` is changed.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the issue.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

assignee.description: Username to assign to this issue. **This field is deprecated.**

assignees.description: Usernames to assign to this issue. Pass one or more user logins to _replace_ the set of assignees on this issue. Send an empty array (`[]`) to clear all assignees from the issue. Only users with push access can set assignees for new issues. Without push access to the repository, assignee changes are silently dropped.

labels.description: Labels to associate with this issue. Pass one or more labels to _replace_ the set of labels on this issue. Send an empty array (`[]`) to clear all labels from the issue. Only users with push access can set labels for issues. Without push access to the repository, label changes are silently dropped.

state.description: The open or closed state of the issue.

state_reason.description: The reason for the state change. Ignored unless `state` is changed.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
